name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: January 2, Guangzhou. Villagers in Qingqiao Street, Songnan, were dissatisfied with the compensation plan and forced relocation, and held up signs in protest.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: December 30, Jinan, Shandong. A dispute broke out between a nurse and a delivery man because the address was not written clearly and the delivery man did not deliver the food to the door. The nurse insulted the delivery man, "You are the lowest level of society." On January 3, a staff member of the Lixia District People's Hospital said that the nurse involved had apologized to the delivery man, and the two sides reached a settlement. The nurse was suspended for one month.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On January 2, in Shantou, Guangdong, two people on a motorcycle attacked passers-by with fireworks along the road, causing the motorcycle to lose balance and fall to the ground after the passers-by were hit by the fireworks.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On January 2, the media reported that an 11-year-old girl in Kaifeng, Henan was taken to a KTV by her classmates and a dropout teenager and was beaten, insulted, and raped by many people. The video of the insult to the girl was also posted online. 
On December 15, Xiaohua (pseudonym), an 11-year-old girl in the sixth grade of Qixian Primary School, was taken to a KTV in the county by her classmates, several off-campus students, and dropout teenagers. She was beaten, insulted, and raped by many people. 
Xiaohua's mother, Ms. Yang, said that on the afternoon of December 15, 2023, Xiaohua was called to a KTV room in the county by a female classmate who had transferred to another school. A total of 9 students and dropout teenagers, including 5 girls and 4 boys, stripped Xiaohua's clothes and ordered Xiaohua to kneel in front of them. Xiaohua was then beaten with belts and other items, and wine was poured on her head. A dropout also raped Xiaohua in public. 
Ms. Yang later learned from the police. The sexual assaulter is over 14 years old but under 15 years old. He started sexually assaulting Xiaohua in October 2023, but threatened Xiaohua not to say anything, otherwise he would "kill her whole family." Ms. Yang said that after the violence, these people also posted videos insulting Xiaohua on the Internet and snatched Xiaohua's mobile phone and sold it. 
At present, the dropouts who sexually assaulted Xiaohua and other suspects have been taken coercive measures by the police. Xiaohua now often wakes up at night, crying and laughing, and can only be hospitalized for treatment and can no longer continue to go to school. Ms. Yang and her husband are now on the verge of mental collapse. In addition, according to Ms. Yang, the incident has happened for more than half a month, and no parents have come out so far. 
On the afternoon of December 31, 2023, Captain Gao of the Criminal Police Brigade of Qi County Public Security Bureau said that the case would definitely be handled in accordance with the law. Because it involves minors, the details of the case are inconvenient to disclose.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
"Between advance and retreat"
On January 2, Hu Xijin expressed his views on the host Cheng Hao's remarks and expressed his support for Hainan Radio and Television's decision to suspend Cheng Hao's work. He also said that there are voices in the public opinion field that "applaud" the Japanese disaster, which is part of the public opinion ecology, but public figures should not be involved in it, but should keep a distance from it.
However, Hu Xijin once posted a message after the 5.8-magnitude earthquake occurred in the offshore east coast of Honshu, Japan on August 25: It is not excessive to say that Japan is "punished by God" at this time.
Afterwards, Hu Xijin posted a message in the early morning of January 3, 24, explaining that Japan started to discharge nuclear contaminated water into the sea for the first time on August 24 last year, and a 5.8-magnitude earthquake occurred the next day. At that time, the harmless earthquake was likened to a signal that Japan was "punished by God", and the context provided space for such speech.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: In Rizhao, Shandong, real-name registration is required for purchasing fireworks and firecrackers

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On January 2, in Jiangxi, a woman was setting off fireworks in an open area outdoors. The police came over and threw the fireworks away from the woman's hand. As a result, the fireworks that fell to the ground hit the onlookers.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On January 2, Sina Finance reported that the manager of a barbecue restaurant in Zibo said that the number of tables served every day has dropped to single digits. At the peak, there were nearly 40 employees, and now it is enough to keep one person in each position. 
The manager said that in order to save costs, he now works part-time as a cashier and is also responsible for grilling skewers in the back kitchen. The clerk who solicits customers outside the door was originally a master who was responsible for charcoal burning. 
From the peak of more than 400 tables per day, it suddenly dropped to single digits. The manager said that he felt disappointed.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On January 2, Reuters reported that according to five insiders, the draft of the "Online Game Management Measures" had a bad impact, causing the game industry's stocks to plummet and huge losses. Feng Shixin, director of the Publicity Department's Publishing Bureau, was dismissed last week.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On January 3, Xinjiang Post began to completely ban the acceptance of any knife-related items.
According to the contributor, kitchen knives could be accepted before 2024. Today, they suddenly said that they could not accept them.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On January 3, Bloomberg reported that the MSCI China Index peaked in early 2021 and then continued to fall, and has now plummeted by nearly 60%; but on the other hand, valuations have also fallen to the lowest level in the world. According to Bloomberg's latest survey, nearly a third of the 417 respondents said they would increase their holdings of Chinese stocks in the next 12 months. In contrast, this proportion was only 19% in August. At the same time, only one in five people plan to reduce their holdings of Chinese stocks.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Data correction: According to domestic news, the number of fans increased by 1 million overnight

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On January 3, a screenshot of a Hangzhou lawyer group was circulated online, showing that a lawyer went to the prison to meet with a client, and the client told the lawyer that he was beaten by the supervisor. So the lawyer wrote a letter to report the situation. As a result, the meeting was not approved the next day.
The prison said that according to Article 4 of the "Regulations on Lawyers Meeting with Detained Criminals", lawyers do not have the authority to appeal to supervisors on behalf of prisoners, and this is an internal matter of the prison.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On January 2, the media reported that recently, the Statistics Bureau of Hongta District, Yuxi City, Yunnan Province, publicly recruited labor dispatch employees, among which the salary of the accounting position after regularization is 1,950 yuan/month. The relevant person in charge of a human resources service company in Yuxi responded that "this position is a labor dispatch worker recruited by the Statistics Bureau. After deducting more than 400 yuan of social security fees, the salary after regularization is more than 1,500 yuan/month." The staff of the Hongta District Statistics Bureau said that "the situation is true, and the minimum wage standard of the second-class areas in Yunnan Province is implemented, which is not in violation of regulations."

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
January 2, Taigemu Town, Tumote Left Banner, Hohhot City, Inner Mongolia.
A mother released a video saying that in mid-December 2023, her daughter was beaten to death by her daughter's husband, Tang Moumou, a cadre of the Youth Political College of Inner Mongolia Normal University, after drinking and domestic violence.
On January 2, 2024, a staff member of the Party and Government Office of the college told reporters that Tang Moumou has been detained by the police and the case has entered the judicial process. The school does not know the specific details of the case at present. Please refer to the police information.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On January 2, the media reported that a subordinate unit of China Construction Second Engineering Bureau Co., Ltd. owed 53 workers a total of 1.4 million yuan in wages. After being ordered by the Social Security Bureau, it still failed to comply. China Construction Second Engineering Bureau was fined 2,000 yuan.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Under a message from Xi Jinping for the New Year in 2024, netizens said: "Excellent eloquence" "Very successful" "We are so happy"
